name: 李弘毅
objective:
本課程內容包括﹕熱力學第一定律、熱力學第二定律、結合兩定律之可用能、單相系統、可用能分析、多相系統、動力廠、冷凍、熱力最佳化、不可逆熱力學。
The contents of this course include the first law of thermodynamics, the second law of thermodynamics, the two laws combined in analysis: the destruction of exergy, single-phase systems, exergy analysis, multiphase systems, refrigeration, thermodynamic optimization, and irreversible thermodynamics.
schedule:
1. Thermodynamic properties
2. Thermodynamic state analysis
3. Polytropic process)
4. First law close system
5. First law open system
6. Steady state steady flow system
7. Idea gas system
8. Second law
9. Midterm exam
10. Carnot cycle
11. Entropy analysis
12. Gibbs  function
13. Power cycle
14. Exergy analysis
15. Optimal analysis
16. Irreversibility
17. Second law efficiency
18. Final exam
materials:
Textbook:
Thermodynamics: An Engineering Approach (9th Edition),Yunus A. Cengel, Michael A. Boles, Mehmet Kanoglu, McGraw-Hill, 2019.
References:
Fundamentals of thermodynamics (SI Edition), Claus Borgnakke, Richard E. Sonntag, Wiley, 2014.
consultation: 開學後建立高等工程熱力學課程 Line 群組
